isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 MODEL - CHASSIS ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Trailer Socket Wiring

svcsubproc.title: Without Sleeper
svcsubproc.para: The 7-way trailer socket (577) connects the tractor and trailer wiring for operation of stop, tail, turn and hazard, and clearance lights. Additionally, the trailer socket includes a circuit that provides power for the trailer ABS system. Each circuit is fed by a dedicated relay.
